decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Erection of rear single storey infill extension at the rear of no. 13 Heathfield Terrace only.
Report on the impact on trees dated 16th October 2015 by John Cromar's Arboricultural Company Limited
Archaeological Desk Based Assessment 2015286 dated August 2015 by Archaeology South East
P_12, P_02, P_01, P_10, P_08, P_09
Design and access statement dated December 2015 by Marek Wojciechowski Architects
All received 23/12/15) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - This consent does not permit the demolition or dismantling of any part of the building, or the removal of any external feature, except in so far as the repairs hereby approved necessitate the removal of certain parts of the existing structure as specifically shown on the approved drawings.
Condition : 5 - All construction works shall be managed in accordance with the approved Construction Management Plan and in accordance with John Cromars report on the protection of trees
description: Erection of rear single storey infill extension at the rear of no. 13 Heathfield only - Listed Building Consent
